name: Chocolate Bread
author: Bowen
summary: This chocolate bread doesn't taste sweet.  It tastes savory, and is good with cream cheese!
ingredients: 1 ¾ cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)
directions: Combine flour, salt, yeast, sugar, cocoa, sunflower oil, and water in a large bowl
Stir everything with a wooden spoon until you have a soft dough
Place the dough on a lightly floured surface
Knead for five minutes, until smooth and elastic
Divide the dough in half, and roll each half into a ball
Place both on a baking sheet
Cut crisscross designs in the tops, and cover with a kitchen towel
Let rise until double in size
Bake at 425 degrees F (220 degrees C) for 35 minutes
